email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We are looking to ship 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The freight rate is USD 45/MT on a CIF basis. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan is flexible between October 20 and October 25. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering it to USD 42/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

We can adjust the rate to USD 43/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. We agree to the rate of USD 43/MT and the demurrage rate of USD 15,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the booking for the OCEAN HARMONY. The laycan remains October 20 to October 25. We will send you the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Emily Chen
